title: No Popup Menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Photon version of the software, a bug related to the popup menu in the Java editor ruler has been observed. The expected behavior is that when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a menu should appear allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks. However, this menu does not appear.
OB: No popup menu appears when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
EB: A menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
